mc.name: Aven Trooper

Flying
{2}{W}, Discard a card: Aven Trooper gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{2}{W}, Discard a card from your hand: Aven Trooper gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The very skies seethe with the aven's hatred for the Cabal.

mc.name: False Memories
mc.oracleText: Put the top seven cards of your library into your graveyard. At end of turn, remove seven cards in your graveyard from the game.
mc.printedText: Put the top seven cards of your library into your graveyard. At end of turn, remove seven cards in your graveyard from the game.
mc.flavorText:
"My enemies will forget everything but their anguish."
--Ambassador Laquatus

{G}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
{G}, Sacrifice Narcissism: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mc.name: Transcendence
mc.oracleText:
You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.

When you have 20 or more life, you lose the game.

Whenever you lose life, you gain 2 life for each 1 life you lost. (Damage dealt to you causes you to lose life.)
mc.printedText:
You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.
When you have 20 or more life, you lose the game.
Whenever you lose life, you gain 2 life for each 1 life you lost. (Damage dealt to you causes you to lose life.)

mc.name: Teroh's Faithful
mc.oracleText: When Teroh's Faithful comes into play, you gain 4 life.
mc.printedText: When Teroh's Faithful comes into play, you gain 4 life.
mc.flavorText: The light of reason follows them even into battle.

Trample

mc.name: Carrion Rats
mc.oracleText: Whenever Carrion Rats attacks or blocks, any player may remove a card in his or her graveyard from the game. If a player does, Carrion Rats deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Carrion Rats attacks or blocks, any player may remove a card in his or her graveyard from the game. If a player does, Carrion Rats deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Just what I need--more competition."
--Cabal grave robber

Tap target untapped creature you control. If you do, it deals damage equal to its power to target attacking or blocking creature an opponent controls.
Flashback-{1}{W}, Pay 3 life. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.printedText: Target player shuffles up to four target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.
mc.flavorText:
None can find what hasn't been lost.
--Nantuko teaching

mc.name: Mind Sludge
mc.oracleText: Target player discards a card for each Swamp you control.
mc.printedText: Target player discards a card from his or her hand for each swamp you control.
mc.flavorText: When you get into the swamp, the swamp gets into you.

mc.name: Carrion Wurm
mc.oracleText: Whenever Carrion Wurm attacks or blocks, any player may remove three cards in his or her graveyard from the game. If a player does, Carrion Wurm deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Carrion Wurm attacks or blocks, any player may remove three cards in his or her graveyard from the game. If a player does, Carrion Wurm deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.flavorText: Since it eats only carrion, sometimes it needs to make some from scratch.

mc.name: Barbarian Outcast
mc.oracleText: When you control no Swamps, sacrifice Barbarian Outcast.
mc.printedText: When you control no swamps, sacrifice Barbarian Outcast.
mc.flavorText:
"We offer power to anyone willing to take it. Sadly, few are unburdened enough by their prejudices to accept."
--Cabal surgeon

mc.printedText: Whenever Cephalid Aristocrat becomes the target of a spell or ability, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

Flying

mc.printedText:
Flying

mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a shred counter on Cephalid Vandal. Then put the top card of your library into your graveyard for each shred counter on Cephalid Vandal.

mc.name: Grim Lavamancer
mc.oracleText: {R}, {T}, Remove two cards in your graveyard from the game: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {R}, {T}, Remove two cards in your graveyard from the game: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."

mc.name: Stupefying Touch
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When Stupefying Touch comes into play, draw a card.
Enchanted creature's activated abilities can't be played.
mc.printedText:
When Stupefying Touch comes into play, draw a card.
Enchanted creature's activated abilities can't be played.
mc.flavorText: Just because your eyes are open doesn't mean you're awake.

mc.name: Pitchstone Wall
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever you discard a card, you may sacrifice Pitchstone Wall. If you do, return the discarded card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
Whenever you discard a card from your hand, you may sacrifice Pitchstone Wall. If you do, return the discarded card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: Its material may not be precious, but the minds it protects are.

mc.name: Mortiphobia
mc.oracleText:
{1}{B}, Discard a card: Remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice Mortiphobia: Remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
mc.printedText:
{1}{B}, Discard a card from your hand: Remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice Mortiphobia: Remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
